mutants.code:
def min_operations_to_make_even_sequence(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A) = case
        ans = 1
        dp = [-1] * (N + 1)
        for i in A:
            var1 = dp[i]
            var2 = ans
            ans = max(ans, var1 + 1)
            dp[i] = max(dp[i], var2 + 1)
        results.append(N - ans)
    return results
